text: Abo balandela, uMthunywa, onguMprofeti ongakwazi kufunda nakubhala9, yena kanye lowo bamfumana echazwe kwiTorah nakwi-Injîl. Yena ubayalela okulungileyo abalele okungendawo, abavumele okulungileyo okusemthethweni, aze abalele okungendawo okungekho mthethweni. Abakhulule kwimithwalo yabo enzima nakwizibophelelo ezabekwa phezu kwabo. Ke bona abo bakholwayo kuye baya kumhlonipha, bamncedise yena, balandele nokhanyiselo (lwe’Kur’ân) ethunyelwe kuye, ngabo ke abaya kuphumelela
